title: why is oracle so unreliable in revealing and DISABLING traps??/
body:
^
sometimes when i use oracle on bushes shaco boxes jhin trap etc etc are not revealed or disabled

replies.body: I've noticed on ARAM that half the time it doesn't seem to disable them.
You need to be in the bush or have vision of the inside of it, in order to see them.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=urUxjoZ6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-09T21:33:22.223+0000)
>
> You need to be in the bush or have vision of the inside of it, in order to see them.

no, teemo shrooms and wards are always revealed even without bush vision
